actions.description: The abjurer makes three Arcane Burst attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) force damage.
actions.name: Arcane Burst

actions.description: Each creature in a 20-foot cube originating from the abjurer must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) force damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away from the abjurer. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.
actions.name: Force Blast

actions.description:
The abjurer casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
At will: dancing lights, mage hand, message, prestidigitation

2/day each: dispel magic, lightning bolt, mage armor

1/day each: arcane lock, banishment, globe of invulnerability, invisibility, wall of force
actions.name: Spellcasting
